title: New: Mannequins on 7th Street – Sofia
body:
Having wowed with their debut track, the epic, beauteous _Wailing of Hesione_, London via Belgium duo **Mannequins on 7th Street** have released a second track in as many weeks, the more electronically orientated _Sofia_.

Mixing the immaculate vocals that stood out on their first outing, with a slick, almost R&B inspired beat, it’s one of those tracks that you never really want to end.
